snippet.title: Floppy Knights - Science Fair Teaser
snippet.description:
RELEASING IN 2022! (update)
🏆 Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1057800?utm_source=community&utm_campaign=teaser&utm_medium=twitter&utm_content=video

Here’s a first look at the next episode: Science Fair! 🏆🎉

Help Phoebe & Carlton complete unique challenges and qualify for the next round. Then, go head to head with Alex & Rowan in the Science Fair finale— may the best inventor win!
